item.title: 10 Steps to free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: 10 Steps to free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages Blog like a developer: with Hugo and Markdown via your GitHub repository in 10 easy steps. This is a quick guide to your own static blog hosted on GitHub Pages and served on your own domain. If hosted on GitHub your site can be a 1GB behemoth serving 100GB/month of data - very generous limits (more info available at about-github-pages).
